articles.headline: Seattle filmmaker puts new spin on old game show classics
articles.description: A Seattle filmmaker and her best friend have turned their love for game shows into the real thing.

articles.headline: Person of Interest: Claire Buss, Filmmaker and Game-Show Host
articles.description: The Future Is 0 is a satirical game show filmed in front of a live studio audience. The show features Northwest artists as contestants competing in games that are designed to underscore how funny and stupid it is to be a human in 2017.

articles.headline: 'The Future Is 0' -- A Live Game Show for Nihilists
articles.description: The absurdist Seattle-produced show features challenges like 'High-Rise Condo or New Age Band?'

articles.headline: This Seattle Filmmaker Loves Game Shows So Much, SHe Started One In Her Living Room
articles.description: A lot of kids grow up wanting to make it in show business and Seattle filmmaker Claire Buss was no different.
